endpoints.description: Retrieve the scheduled maintenance activities for various energy equipment.
Create a new maintenance activity schedule.
Update an existing maintenance schedule identified by its ID.
Remove a specific maintenance activity from the schedule using its unique ID.
Fetch the current operational status of the energy sector equipment.
Generate a new alert for specified equipment based on predefined conditions.
List all current alerts associated with energy sector equipment.
Mark the maintenance status of specific equipment identified by its ID.
Retrieve detailed reports on past maintenance activities.
Access performance metrics for equipment to ensure operational reliability.
